job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: The Site Reliability Engineer SRE position requires a mix of strategic engineering and design along with handson technical work An ideal candidate will have experience in being a Systems Administrator that has moved on to DevOpsAutomation in their career and have coding skills to automate tasks and build tools to help with our service operations The SRE will configure tune and troubleshoot multitiered systems to achieve optimal application performance stability and availability The SRE will work closely with the software engineers infrastructure and network engineers to
